trans-unit.source: Represents different collections of management objects retrieved through WMI.
trans-unit.target: 表示經由 WMI 所擷取的各種管理物件集合。

trans-unit.source: The objects in this collection are of <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementBaseObject" />-derived types, including <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObject" /> and <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementClass" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合中的物件屬於 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementBaseObject" /> 所衍生的型別，其中包括 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObject" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementClass" />。

trans-unit.source: The collection can be the result of a WMI query executed through a <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher" />, or an enumeration of management objects of a specified type retrieved through a <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementClass" /> representing that type.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以是執行 WMI 查詢 (經由 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher" />) 的結果，或指定型別 (經由表示該型別的 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementClass" /> 所擷取) 之管理物件的列舉型別 (Enumeration)。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this can be a collection of management objects related in a specified way to a specific management object - in this case the collection would be retrieved through a method such as <see cref="M:System.Management.ManagementObject.GetRelated" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，還可以是在指定方面與特定管理物件相關聯的管理物件集合；在這種情況下，集合將會經由例如 <see cref="M:System.Management.ManagementObject.GetRelated" /> 這樣的方法來擷取。

trans-unit.source: The collection can be walked using the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection.ManagementObjectEnumerator" /> and objects in it can be inspected or manipulated for various management tasks.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以使用 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection.ManagementObjectEnumerator" /> 來輕鬆運用，而其中物件也可以因應各種管理工作加以檢查或操作。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: 將集合複製至陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array to copy to.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index to start from.
trans-unit.target: 做為開頭的索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: 將集合複製至陣列。

trans-unit.target: 目標陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index to start from.
trans-unit.target: 做為開頭的索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the items in the collection to a <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementBaseObject" /> array.
trans-unit.target: 將集合中的項目複製至 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementBaseObject" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合中物件的數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value indicating the number of objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指出集合中物件的數目。

trans-unit.source: This property is very expensive - it requires that all members of the collection be enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是非常耗費資源-它需要列舉集合中的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的物件數目。

trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Releases resources associated with this object.
trans-unit.target: 釋出與這個物件相關聯的資源。

trans-unit.source: After this method has been called, an attempt to use this object will result in an <see cref="T:System.ObjectDisposedException" /> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫這個方法之後，嘗試使用這個物件時，會導致 <see cref="T:System.ObjectDisposedException" /> 被擲回。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.target: 處置物件所保有的資源。

trans-unit.target: 這是物件的解構函式。

trans-unit.source: Finalizers are expressed using destructor syntax.
trans-unit.target: 完成項會使用解構函式語法來表示。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，可用於逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: You can only iterate (as in a Visual Basic .NET `For Each` statement or a C# `For` statement) through a forward-only enumerator one time.
trans-unit.target: 您只可以逐一查看 (如 Visual Basic.NET 所示`For Each`陳述式或 C#`For`陳述式) 透過順向的列舉值一次。

trans-unit.source: The memory containing the instances is released by WMI so that the enumerator cannot be rewound.
trans-unit.target: 包含執行個體的記憶體釋放 WMI，使列舉值無法回復。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection.Count%2A> method cannot be used since it requires rewinding the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection.Count%2A>方法無法使用，因為它需要倒帶列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Forward-only enumerators are generally much faster and use less memory than conventional enumerators, but they do not allow calls to <xref:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection.ManagementObjectEnumerator.Reset%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 順向的列舉值通常較快，並使用較少的記憶體比傳統的列舉值，但不是允許呼叫<xref:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection.ManagementObjectEnumerator.Reset%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If an enumerator is rewindable, the objects in the collection will be kept available for multiple enumerations.
trans-unit.target: 如果列舉值可重新扭轉，集合中的物件會保留供多個列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the object is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出物件是否已同步化。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value indicating whether the object is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指出物件是否已同步化。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: `true`, if the object is synchronized, otherwise `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true`如果同步的物件，否則`false`。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object to be used for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 取得要用於同步處理的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> value that represents the object to be used for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 值，表示要用於同步處理的物件。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: The object to be used for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 要用於進行同步處理的物件。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that iterates through the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回透過 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 重複的 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementObjectCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#]
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic、 C#]

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在這個位置上，呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在讀取 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 的值之前，必須呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 或 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 會將 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 設定為下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>也會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`，則呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次將 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 之後，接著呼叫 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之間修改集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>傳回項目所設定，即使列舉值已經無效。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值對集合並沒有獨佔存取，因此列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。
